00048 void MCTM_Configuration(void);

00053 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00054   * @brief  Main program.
00055   * @retval None

00057 int main(void)
00058 {
00059   MCTM_Configuration();
00060 
00061   while (1);
00062 }
00063 
00064 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00065   * @brief  Configures MCTM to output PWM.
00066   * @retval None
00067   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00068 void MCTM_Configuration(void)
00069 {
00070   /* !!! NOTICE !!!
00071      Notice that the local variable (structure) did not have an initial value.
00072      Please confirm that there are no missing members in the parameter settings below in this function.
00073   */
00074   TM_TimeBaseInitTypeDef MCTM_TimeBaseInitStructure;
00075   TM_OutputInitTypeDef MCTM_OutputInitStructure;
00076   MCTM_CHBRKCTRInitTypeDef MCTM_CHBRKCTRInitStructure;
00077 
00078   CKCU_PeripClockConfig_TypeDef CKCUClock = {{ 0 }};
00079   CKCUClock.Bit.AFIO                                = 1;
00080   CKCUClock.Bit.HTCFG_MCTM_BREAK_GPIO_CLOCK_ID      = 1;
00081   CKCUClock.Bit.MCTM0                               = 1;
00082   CKCU_PeripClockConfig(CKCUClock, ENABLE);
00083 
00084   /* Configure MCTM Channel 0 output pin                                                                    */
00085   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_MCTM_CH0_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_MCTM_CH0_AFIO_PIN, AFIO_FUN_MCTM_GPTM);
00086   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_MCTM_CH0N_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_MCTM_CH0N_AFIO_PIN, AFIO_FUN_MCTM_GPTM);
00087   /* Configure MCTM Channel 1 output pin                                                                    */
00088   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_MCTM_CH1_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_MCTM_CH1_AFIO_PIN, AFIO_FUN_MCTM_GPTM);
00089   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_MCTM_CH1N_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_MCTM_CH1N_AFIO_PIN, AFIO_FUN_MCTM_GPTM);
00090   /* Configure MCTM Channel 2 output pin                                                                    */
00091   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_MCTM_CH2_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_MCTM_CH2_AFIO_PIN, AFIO_FUN_MCTM_GPTM);
00092   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_MCTM_CH2N_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_MCTM_CH2N_AFIO_PIN, AFIO_FUN_MCTM_GPTM);
00093   /* Configure MCTM Break pin                                                                               */
00094   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_MCTM_BREAK_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_MCTM_BREAK_AFIO_PIN, AFIO_FUN_MCTM_GPTM);
00095 
00096   /* Configure MCTM Break pin pull resistor to avoid floating input                                         */
00097   GPIO_PullResistorConfig(HTCFG_MCTM_BREAK_GPIO_PORT, HTCFG_MCTM_BREAK_AFIO_PIN, GPIO_PR_UP);
00098 
00099   /* MCTM Time Base configuration                                                                           */
00100   MCTM_TimeBaseInitStructure.CounterReload = HTCFG_MCTM_RELOAD - 1;
00101   MCTM_TimeBaseInitStructure.Prescaler = 0;
00102   MCTM_TimeBaseInitStructure.RepetitionCounter = 0;
00103   MCTM_TimeBaseInitStructure.CounterMode = TM_CNT_MODE_UP;
00104   MCTM_TimeBaseInitStructure.PSCReloadTime = TM_PSC_RLD_IMMEDIATE;
00105   TM_TimeBaseInit(HT_MCTM0, &MCTM_TimeBaseInitStructure);
00106 
00107   /* MCTM Channel 0, 1, 2 output configuration                                                              */
00108   MCTM_OutputInitStructure.Channel = TM_CH_0;
00109   MCTM_OutputInitStructure.OutputMode = TM_OM_PWM1;
00110   MCTM_OutputInitStructure.Control = TM_CHCTL_ENABLE;
00111   MCTM_OutputInitStructure.ControlN = TM_CHCTL_ENABLE;
00112   MCTM_OutputInitStructure.Polarity = TM_CHP_NONINVERTED;
00113   MCTM_OutputInitStructure.PolarityN = TM_CHP_NONINVERTED;
00114   MCTM_OutputInitStructure.IdleState = MCTM_OIS_LOW;
00115   MCTM_OutputInitStructure.IdleStateN = MCTM_OIS_HIGH;
00116   MCTM_OutputInitStructure.Compare = HTCFG_MCTM_RELOAD * 3 / 4;
00117   MCTM_OutputInitStructure.AsymmetricCompare = 0;
00118   TM_OutputInit(HT_MCTM0, &MCTM_OutputInitStructure);
00119 
00120   MCTM_OutputInitStructure.Channel = TM_CH_1;
00121   MCTM_OutputInitStructure.Compare = HTCFG_MCTM_RELOAD * 1 / 2;
00122   TM_OutputInit(HT_MCTM0, &MCTM_OutputInitStructure);
00123 
00124   MCTM_OutputInitStructure.Channel = TM_CH_2;
00125   MCTM_OutputInitStructure.Compare = HTCFG_MCTM_RELOAD * 1 / 4;
00126   TM_OutputInit(HT_MCTM0, &MCTM_OutputInitStructure);
00127 
00128   /* MCTM Off State, lock, Break, Automatic Output enable, dead time configuration                          */
00129   MCTM_CHBRKCTRInitStructure.OSSRState = MCTM_OSSR_STATE_ENABLE;
00130   MCTM_CHBRKCTRInitStructure.OSSIState = MCTM_OSSI_STATE_ENABLE;
00131   MCTM_CHBRKCTRInitStructure.LockLevel = MCTM_LOCK_LEVEL_2;
00132   MCTM_CHBRKCTRInitStructure.Break0 = MCTM_BREAK_ENABLE;
00133   MCTM_CHBRKCTRInitStructure.Break0Polarity = MCTM_BREAK_POLARITY_LOW;
00134   MCTM_CHBRKCTRInitStructure.AutomaticOutput = MCTM_CHAOE_ENABLE;
00135   MCTM_CHBRKCTRInitStructure.DeadTime = HTCFG_MCTM_DEAD_TIME;
00136   MCTM_CHBRKCTRInitStructure.BreakFilter = 0;
00137   MCTM_CHBRKCTRConfig(HT_MCTM0, &MCTM_CHBRKCTRInitStructure);
00138 
00139   /* MCTM counter enable                                                                                    */
00140   TM_Cmd(HT_MCTM0, ENABLE);
00141 
00142   /* MCTM Channel Main Output enable                                                                        */
00143   MCTM_CHMOECmd(HT_MCTM0, ENABLE);
00144 }
00145 
00146 #if (HT32_LIB_DEBUG == 1)
00147 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00148   * @brief  Report both the error name of the source file and the source line number.
00149   * @param  filename: pointer to the source file name.
00150   * @param  uline: error line source number.
00151   * @retval None
00152   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00153 void assert_error(u8* filename, u32 uline)
00154 {
00155   /*
00156      This function is called by IP library that the invalid parameters has been passed to the library API.
00157      Debug message can be added here.
00158      Example: printf("Parameter Error: file %s on line %d\r\n", filename, uline);
00159   */
00160 
00161   while (1)
00162   {
00163   }
00164 }
00165 #endif
